Event.EventName: Your friend calls you and asks if you want to come over for a cup of tea.

EventOption.EventOptionDescription: Go for a cup of tea
EventOption.EventOptionPostDescription: Your friend tells you about how work has been going at work on the hospital's Covid-19 ward... you forgot what they did for work...

EventOption.EventOptionDescription: Have a chat over the phone instead
EventOption.EventOptionPostDescription: You have a good chat over the phone and wish them well
